nodes.text: The Whirlwind of Destiny was a lightsaber technique developed by a Human male Jedi Initiate named Petro in 20 BBY.
Whirlwind of Destiny was designed for the user to be flexible, spinning his/her body and lightsaber around like an actual whirlwind.

The Whirlwind of Destiny maneuver was created by a young fan named Brendon Lake as part of the "Join the Jedi" contest sponsored by Hasbro. As a reward for winning the contest, the maneuver was animated into the show, and Lake received screen credit for it.
